translations: n．困境，窘境：一个困难或不幸的情况。
· Many people are unaware of the plights faced by homeless individuals.
许多人并不了解无家可归者所面临的困境。
v．许诺，承诺：正式地或庄重地承诺或保证。

sentences.sentence: Their plights this season have been remarkably similar.
sentences.translation: 他们这个赛季的困境惊人的相似。

sentences.sentence: Nor can you legitimately blame others for your unhealthy plights.
sentences.translation: 你也不能因为自己的健康问题而对他人横加指责。

sentences.sentence: In spite of this, these plights do not imply that originalism has lost its rationality.
sentences.translation: 尽管如此，这些困境并不意味着原旨主义方法失去了合理性通道。
